body.p: To the Governor of the State of Kentucky

Sir your petitioners would resepctfully respresent that at the last term of the Pike Circuit Court there was a judgmnt rendered against Henry D Harman for $50, for the offense of selling liquor to a minor: the proff was contradictory: the mineor was barely under age -- and Mr Harman not well acquainted with the Young Man -- Harman was at the time a Licensed tavern Keeper in Pikeville We think his case is a hard one and Solicit your favor,

J. S. Dury
Comth Atty
O. C. Bowles
Lewis sowards
Wm. sword
W C H Sowards
Arch' Huffman
Hubbard Williamson clerk of the Pike county court
Jas M Sowards mrchnt
W M Scott "
James Ferguson

Pike Cir Ct
vs
Henry. D. Harman
$50. Tipling
Petition to the Governor
Remitted 16 Dec/65
